I design interfaces

I create interfaces for analytics systems with a lot of data represented in graphs and tables. Also I create design systems with detailed UI documentation.

CV Portfolio

I create an ergonomic and usable design

I create an ergonomic and usable design

I work in design all my professional life since year 2011. I started as a graphic designer then switched to web.

Likewise, I worked as a web designer and learned web technologies. Since autumn 2021 I have worked as a product designer.

Skills

  • Design system, UI ki
  • Atomic design & tokens
  • Figma design + prototypes
  • Documentation (storybook)
  • UX research
  • HTML, CSS, JS / SPA
  • Mentorship
  • Writing texts

Portfolio

Aacademy

I help people to start career in frontend

I have worked in .html academy since 2019 as a mentor. I also work with materials, blog and additional courses as author and reviewer.

I like to work with students: share my experience and look how they growing up. And it’s very nice to have a good feedback from them.

My achievements

  • 15 сourses I mentored in 3 years
  • 50 students I mentored during one or two courses of the profession
  • 66% of students passed the exam, which is above the average for the course
  • 30% of students leaved thanks with ratings 10 out of 10
  • 10 articles written for learning materials
  • 23 review articles with task examples for light course
